## Science

```         
marine ecology 
  - spatial ecology
  - community ecology
  - population dynamics
  - corals, fish, plants, fossils, microbes

research themes 
  - climate change impacts on marine systems
  - larval dispersal and connectivity
  - restoration, scaling
  - Holocene reef dynamics, reef accretion, coral carbonate budgets
  - conservation, science-policy integration
```

## Data analytics

```         

  - Spatial & statistical modelling (R, Python, Julia; GLMMs, hierarchical & spatio-temporal models)
  - Bayesian approaches (Stan, brms, INLA; prior elicitation, PPCs)
  - Geospatial data science (sf, stars, terra, GDAL/PostGIS; web/3D maps with Leaflet, D3, CesiumJS)
  - Earth observation & big-data remote sensing (Sentinel/Landsat/VIIRS/MODIS; COG/NetCDF/Zarr; xarray/dask/stars; scalable pipelines on GEE/AWS; change detection & time-series)

  - Simulation & agent-based modelling (stochastic/forward models, particle tracking, ABM)
  - Data visualisation (ggplot2, plotly, Shiny; JavaScript/D3/CesiumJS)
  - Data engineering, analytics & LLMs (AWS EC2/S3, Docker, Make/Snakemake; applied LLM workflows)
  - Open science & reproducibility (Git/GitHub, Quarto/R Markdown, pkgdown, CI/CD, conda/mamba, renv, Zenodo)
```
